title: Flappy Bird 1.3
description:
Flappy Bird by .GEARS Studios
An Arcade and Action Game

Flappy Bird is a 2013 bird flying game developed in Hanoi by Vietnam-based developer NguyÃ¡Â»â€¦n HÃƒÂ  Ã„ï¿½ÃƒÂ´ng and published by .GEARS Studios, a small, independent game developer also based in Vietnam. It was originally released in May 2013 for the iPhone 5, then updated for iOS6 and later in September 2013. In January 2014, it topped the free category of the American and Chinese iTunes App Stores and later on that month the UK App Store where it was touted as "the new Angry Birds". It ended January as the most downloaded App on the App Store.

Description:
Flap your wings to fly!

[How to play]
> Tap to flap your wings to fly.
> Avoid pipes.
> Try to get 4 medals: Bronze, Silver, Gold (hard), Platinum (very hard)

Changelog:

Version 1.3
1) Support Android 2.2
2) Fix bugs.
Version 1.2
1) Bug fixes and improve performance.
2) Medal blink added.
Version 1.1
1) Fix high score saving.
2) Force game to portrait mode.
